thread.title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Vote for your fall favorites!
thread.title_full: 10Best Readers' Choice: Vote for your fall favorites!

title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Vote for your fall favorites!
text:
Vote for your fall travel favorites now through Sept. 28 at noon ET. (Photo: Feverpitched, Getty Images/iStockphoto)
3 CONNECT 12 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Temperatures are beginning to cool, leaves are starting to turn and the kids are back in school. Autumn is almost upon us, and USA TODAY 10Best needs your help finding the best experiences this season has to offer. Until noon ET on Monday, September 28, vote once per day for your favorites in the categories of Best Scenic Autumn Drive, Best Fall Harvest Festival, Best Apple Orchard, Best Oktoberfest and Best State Fair. Winners will be announced on Friday, Oct. 2 at noon ET.
Click on each category below to vote, or visit 10Best.com . The nominees in each category are as follows:
Best Scenic Autumn Drive
Vote for your favorite scenic autumn drive once per day through Monday, Sept. 28 at noon ET. (Photo: Thinkstock)
Blue Ridge Parkway - North Carolina & Virginia
Dutch Country Roads - Pennsylvania
Going-to-the-Sun Road - Montana
Historic Columbia River Highway - Oregon
Historic Route 1 - Maine
Hocking Hills Scenic Byway - Ohio
Jacob's Ladder Scenic Byway - Massachusetts
Kancamagus Scenic Byway - New Hampshire
M-22 - Michigan
Middlebury Gap Road - Vermont
Mohawk Trail - Massachusetts
Olympic Peninsula Loop Drive - Washington
Peter Norbeck Scenic Byway - South Dakota
Pig Trail Scenic Byway - Arkansas
Roaring Fork Motor Nature Trail - North Carolina & Tennessee
Scenic 7 Byway - Arkansas
Scenic Route 100 Byway - Vermont
Skyline Drive - Virginia
Upper Delaware Scenic Byway - New York
West Elk Loop - Colorado

These 20 fall harvest festivals offer seasonal fun for the whole family. (Photo: Thinkstock)
AppleJack Festival - Nebraska City, Neb.
Bayfield Apple Festival - Bayfield, Wis.
Circleville Pumpkin Show - Circleville, Ohio
Cranberry Harvest Celebration - Wareham, Mass.
East Texas Yamboree - Gilmer, Texas
Harvest Festival - Santa Fe
Harvest on the Harbor - Portland, Maine

Louisiana Pecan Festival - Colfax, La.
Maine Harvest Festival - Bangor, Maine
National Apple Harvest Festival - Biglerville, Penn.
NC Pecan Harvest Festival - Whiteville, N.C.
Pumpkin Festival - Laconia, N.H.
Reading Terminal Market Harvest Festival - Philadelphia
Sonoma County Harvest Fair - Sonoma, Calif.
Stone Barns Harvest Fest - Pocantico Hills, N.Y.
Trailing of the Sheep Festival - Hailey, Idaho
Warrens Cranberry Festival - Warrens, Wis.
Wellfleet OysterFest - Cape Cod, Mass.
World Championship Punkin Chunkin - Dover, Del.
Best Apple Orchard
Vote for your favorite pick-your-own apple farm now through Monday, Sept. 28 at noon. (Photo: Thinkstock)
Aamodt's Apple Farm - Stillwater, Minn.
Alyson's Orchard - Walpole, N.H.
Apple Dave's Orchards - Warwick, N.Y.
Apple Holler - Sturtevant, Wis.
Beak & Skiff Apple Orchards - LaFayette, N.Y.
Bear Swamp Orchard - Ashfield, Mass.
Bishop's Orchards - Guilford, Conn.
Boyd Orchards - Versailles, Ky.
Deardorff Orchards - Waconia, Minn.
Dwight Miller Orchards - Dummerston, Vt.
Gould Hill Farm - Contoocook, N.H.
Johnson Orchards - Yakima, Wash.
King Orchards - Kewadin, Mich.
Kiyokawa Family Orchards - Parkdale, Ore.
Linvilla Orchards - Media, Penn.
Mercier Orchards - Blue Ridge, Ga.
Sky Top Orchard - Flat Rock, N.C.
Stepp's Hillcrest Orchard - Hendersonville, N.C.
Stribling Orchard - Markham, Va.
Willowbrook Apple Farm - Oak Glen, Calif.
Best Oktoberfest
Which city hosts the best Oktoberfest in the USA? Vote for your favorite now! (Photo: Thinkstock)
Addison Oktoberfest - Addison, Texas
Alpine Village Oktoberfest - Torrance, Calif.
Big Bear Lake Oktoberfest - Big Bear Lake, Calif.
Columbus Oktoberfest - Columbus, Ohio
Denver Oktoberfest - Denver
Frankenmuth Oktoberfest - Frankenmuth, Mich.
Harpoon Octoberfest - Boston
Helen Oktoberfest - Helen, Ga.
International Oktoberfest - Newport, R.I.
Leavenworth Oktoberfest - Leavenworth, Wash.
Linde Oktoberfest Tulsa - Tulsa, Okla.
Mount Angel Oktoberfest - Mount Angel, Ore.
New Ulm Oktoberfest - New Ulm, Minn.
Oktoberfest By The Bay - San Francisco
Oktoberfest Fredericksburg - Fredericksburg, Texas
Oktoberfest U.S.A. - La Crosse, Wis.
Oktoberfest Zinzinnati - Cincinnati
Reading Liederkranz Oktoberfest - Reading, Penn.
St. Alphonsus Oktoberfest - Chicago
Wurstfest - New Braunfels, Texas
Best State Fair
Which of the 50 states hosts the best state fair? Vote for your favorite now! (Photo: Thinkstock)
Alaska State Fair

Colorado State Fair & Rodeo
Eastern States Exposition

Minnesota State Fair

Best of luck to all our nominees!
